mapper.insert: INSERT INTO book (book_ISBN, book_name, book_content, book_author, book_publisher, book_createdAt, book_genre, book_img) VALUES (#{bookISBN}, #{bookName}, #{bookContent}, #{bookAuthor}, #{bookPublisher}, #{bookCreatedAt}, #{bookGenre}, #{bookImg})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY book_ISBN DESC) AS book_no, book_ISBN, book_name, book_content, book_author, book_publisher, book_createdAt, book_genre, book_img FROM book ) row_book WHERE row_book.book_no BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end};

SELECT * FROM book WHERE book_ISBN LIKE CONCAT('%', #{book_ISBN}, '%') OR book_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{book_name}, '%') OR book_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{book_content}, '%') OR book_author LIKE CONCAT('%', #{book_author}, '%') OR book_publisher LIKE CONCAT('%', #{book_publisher}, '%') OR CAST(book_genre AS CHAR) LIKE CONCAT('%', #{book_genre}, '%')
